summary: Donald Trump claimed that it is time to investigate the investigators of the Mueller investigation.
Donald Trump claimed that there are 13 angry Democrats involved in the investigation.
Donald Trump claimed that there are 13 angry Democrats who worked for Obama for eight years.

Donald Trump claimed to Steve Doocy on June 15th, 2018, on the Trump lawn, that the Democrats are weak on immigration and that separating families at the border is a Democrat bill. He believes that the Democrats could easily solve the issue but think it is a good election point, although he thinks it is a horrible election point for them. When Steve Doocy mentioned that ripping families apart is heartless, Trump responded by stating that it is the law.

Donald Trump claimed to Steve Doocy on June 15th, 2018, on the Trump lawn, that the Democrats are responsible for the policy of separating families at the border. He argued that the Democrats could easily solve the issue by working together, but they see it as a good election point. Trump emphasized that although the policy may be seen as heartless, it is the law that the Democrats gave them.

Donald Trump claimed to Steve Doocy that the Democrats are weak on immigration and that they are responsible for the policy of separating families at the border. He believes that the Democrats could easily solve the issue but choose not to because they see it as a good election point. Trump believes that Congress needs to change the laws regarding immigration.

Donald Trump claimed to Steve Doocy that there is a tremendous number of soldiers and MIAs (Missing in Action) who have never been found. He also stated that they know where many of these bodies are. Trump mentioned that Mike Pompeo was in South Korea and asked if there were any developments.
